feed.title: lightning-rfc [PATCH] Enable travis to spellcheck BOLT#10 to 99

entry.title: lightning-rfc [PATCH] Enable travis to spellcheck BOLT#10 to 99
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj has made a tiny patch to enable Travis to spellcheck BOLT#10 and beyond. Rusty thanks ZmnSCPxj for the catch and pushes it straight to the repo. The patch is enabled in .travis.yml file which was changed to include spellcheck for message types, fields and alignment. The patch also introduces tools/spellcheck.sh command that will check the spellings of all BOLT messages between 10 to 99.
